root.title: princevil develop corp pvdc year loss
root.body: shr dilut loss 31 ct v profit 17 ct net loss 2,806,005 v profit 1,513,395 rev 15 mln v 10.4 mln avg shr dilut 8,982,754 v 8,804,899 note current year includ loss 3.4 mln dlr takeov defens expens also includ loss 1.8 mln dlr v 332,000 dlr equiti limit partnership
